categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: The Voxen Tass was a modified Brayl-class bulk freighter that was operational during the Galactic Civil War. Captained by Leona Makk, the Voxen Tass was a ship from Shang Lines. At one point it delivered an Alliance strike team to Argovia, where the team destroyed a sensornet established by the Galactic Empire.
